resources.string: With Fautus you can request a nearby photographer, on demand
To do this, Fautus needs access to your location.
Choose the level of your Fautus photographer, and get matched instantly, on demand
Your photographer will message you within seconds and take professional photos of your casual Moment
After all photos are taken, the Moment is closed. Then, all photos will appear instantly in your own smartphone.
Review them in detail and pay\n for only those like.
SignUp to become a fautus photographer

string.name: sign_up_acc
string.u: Don\'t have an account? Signup now

resources.string: An email will be sent with instructions \n on how to reset your password.
Be ready to take high-quality photos.
Follow the map. Find Fautus users. And let your passion and talent for photography capture their Moment.
Fautus needs access to your location

A Moment opens when a nearby user requests a photographer. After the request is sent, use the map, and find the user’s specific location.\n\nOnce you find the user, take six to nine photos, as they request.
After the last photo is taken, close the Moment. Instantly, all the photos will appear, in protected form, in the user’s app, where they can be purchased and shared.
Approach a potential user, and tell them about Fautus. Take their photos, and share a ‘Snap’ Moment code. It works the same way!
All you need is a DSLR camera with your favorite adapter connected to your phone.
Remember! Sufficient cellular data or a WiFi connection are required at all times
For more detailed information make sure to check the FAQ\'s section
Don\'t see your listed? Enter the brand and model here
All photographers are required to have a semi-professional DSLR camera or better.\n\nPlease select your primary equipment below
Users can request different levels of photographers.\n\nThe cost to the end user, as well as your compensation share, vary upon the chosen level.

Avid photographers are hobbyists who love taking photos with pro or semi-pro DSLR cameras.\n\nThey are matched with users requesting only Avid photographers. The compensation for the Avid level is $0.90 per moment, plus $0.75 per photo sold. Per hour, the average Avid photographer captures 7 Moments, and sells about 21 photos.

Skill photographers have years of experience. They take amazing photos, but photography is not their primary source of income.\n\nSkill photographers can choose to be matched with users requesting either the Skill or Avid levels. The compensation share for Skill photographers is $1.60 per Moment, plus $1.50 per photo sold.

Pro photographers make any practice of the photography industry their main source of income,and are expected to be part of a business.\n\nPro photographers can choose to be matched with users requesting the Avid, Skill, or Pro levels. The compensation share for Pro photographers is $2.30 per Moment, plus $2.25 per photo sold.
Fautus photographers are required to have the Fautus camera strap to identify themselves as a Fautus approved photographer.\nEnter your shipping address to have one shipped to you for free.
I have a snap moment code

At Fautus, we are proud of our photographers’ artistic vision. The authenticity strip that appears to the right of each photo guarantees it is an authentic Fautus photograph, and is a symbol of your support for local artists.
Hey there. Check out this moment!
Once the photoshoot is complete please transfer the photos from your camera to your mobile device, then upload them to automatically share them with your customer to be purchased.
Your photos will appear here automatically once your moment photoshoot is complete.
Fautus uses stripe.com to manage funds transfers between a customer and you. Please provide your banking information for where you would like your funds transferred.
Please enter your business information to be verified as a Pro level Fautus photographer. \n\nThis information is confidential and will not be shared with users.

Your strap is on its way, and should arrive in three to five days.

Don't wait for the strap, though, to begin using Fautus. Contact family and friends.

In the meantime get to know the app and make money by capturing their Moments
Congratulations. Your %1$s expertise is being requested.
The moment is being offered to you for the next 15 seconds; thereafter, other photographers in the area will be notified.
Here is the code for your Snap Moment:
Upload the photos from your Snap Moment, and share that code with your client. Then, they can view and download the photos.
To see your photos, enter your snap code for the Moment your photographer started
We noticed you chose to rate your photographer 2.0 stars for friendliness. Please tell us more so we can improve
Send this moment to the customer
An email will be sent to the user with instructions on how to install and download the app and purchase photos.\n\n*This information will not be sold

A valid password is required to register.

Your full name is required to register as a photographer.
Your city is required to register as a photographer.
Your state is required to register as a photographer.
Your Language is required to register as a photographer.
Your date of birth is required to register as a photographer.
Your last 4 of your SSN is required to register as a photographer.
SSN last 4 must be exactly4 digits.
Your selfie photo is required to register as a photographer.
Your photo id is required to register as a photographer.
Go to settings and enable permissions
Camera,Storage permission required for this app

This is your Fautus Snap Code: 

%1$s

Go to your Fautus App, enter the Snap Code to instantly see the photos your Fautus photographer just took.

We are currently working to enhance your experience by adding a link. Until then, it is that simple.
Are you sure want to Exit?
Are you sure you want to logout of Fautus?
Avid photographers are hobbyists who love taking photos with pro or semi-pro DSLR cameras.
Skill photographers have years of experience. They take amazing photos, but photography is not their primary source of income.
Pro photographers make any practice of the photography industry their main source of income,and are expected to be part of a business.
Sorry there are no available photographers near your location at this time.
You must complete your personal profile and provide and add payment transfer account information for where your funds will be deposited before you can take photos.
You are registered as %1$s and so cannot choose a higher level.
Congratulations! you\'ve been matched with a photographer
Hi, my name is %1$s, and I’m excited to handle your photoshoot today. If you could describe yourself it would help me find you faster.
Download this photo to your device?
No Moment found for this code
There was an error when we tried to save your information. Please try again.

Before you press ‘Continue,’ a warning - You cannot go back.

You can only have one Fautus account per email. So, if you set up a photographer account, you cannot have a user account with that same email.

If you are ready to set up your photographer account, then proceed.

Closing the moment will disconnect you from the user.

You will not be able to add additional photos once the moment is closed.

Please be sure all photos are uploaded and your user is satisfied before continuing.
Please select at least one photo
Your mail is required to invite.
